name: Zenodeath
detailed_description:
NOTE: The trailer and the gameplay do not represent the final, finished product. And yes, we are using placeholders from our older games in certain places for time being, thank you for reading this :) - Jack

The great Zeno war will end soon...... that's right, the series is finally reaching it's conclusion.

Zenodeath is the final entry in the Zeno series (Zenodyne, Zenohell, Zenodyne R) and it definitely is going out with a bang.
Everything we made so far, has built up to this game..... here are some features:

- 9 Stages!
- Said stages are divided evenly between Air and Ground mode.
- Ground mode is the new gameplay type that plays like old arcade run and guns.
- A modern soundtrack by HeavyViper who previously did FM music in our previous games

See you in 2020, when this game comes out, until then, feel free to wishlist it.

short_description: Zenodeath is the final entry in the Zeno series, the final evolution, featuring a modern OST by HeavyViper and two gameplay types.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista and higher
  • Processor: 1,8 Ghz Single Core Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: May not run correctly with Intel HD integrated graphics units.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Vista and higher
  • Processor: 1,8 Ghz Single Core Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: May not run correctly with Intel HD integrated graphics units.
